part-four.label: For greater convenience and security, we also recommend the option of "casting" your phone's screen to the TV. This feature allows for direct streaming of content from your mobile device to the TV without the need to log into individual apps on the TV. It is a quick and secure way to share content and enjoy it on a larger screen.

part-one.label: In our apartment, we provide the latest entertainment experiences thanks to the Android TV system. This advanced system allows access to a wide range of free and subscription-based VOD platforms, meaning our guests can enjoy a diversity of content at their fingertips.

part-three.label: We want to emphasize that when using your own accounts on these platforms, it is important to remember to log out of your account on the TV after watching. This is crucial for protecting your privacy and the security of your data.

part-two.label: With Android TV, guests have the opportunity to use popular streaming services such as YouTube, Netflix, Disney+, and SkyShowTime. You can easily log into your accounts to access your favorite movies, series, and shows, offering entertainment for everyone.

part-one.label: One of the main advantages of our apartment is access to the basic amenities MEGOGO internet TV package from our Smart TV, offering a rich entertainment for everyone.

part-three.label: Additionally, MEGOGO offers an impressive collection of over 2,200 movies and series. Regardless of whether you prefer the latest cinema hits, classics or popular series, our offer will meet your expectations. Spend your evenings watching a relaxing movie while enjoying the comfort and privacy of your own apartment.

part-two.label: With MEGOGO you can enjoy access to 95 TV channels, including popular stations such as Eleven Sports, TVN24, Disney Channel, Ale Kino+ and Kino Polska. This is an ideal proposition for lovers of sports, current news, family films and art cinema.

part-one.label: During your stay in our apartment, we provide you with access to Prime Video on our Smart TV. You can enjoy a wide range of movies, series, and exclusive Amazon Originals productions without any additional fees. We offer you convenient and unlimited access to a broad spectrum of entertainment.

part-three.label: You will find exclusive Amazon Originals content that will surely enrich your time spent in our apartment. Discover new stories and experience unforgettable moments with original productions available only on Prime Video.

part-two.label: Enjoy unlimited access to a diverse collection of movies and series available on Prime Video. From the latest hits to cinema classics, as well as a rich selection of series including exclusive Amazon Originals productions, everything is at your fingertips.
